posts.post_content:
Four SL-ers for sale (to help pay school fees):

Foster - Old Mill -PSA 4 - $310
Ryan - Old Mill - PSA 4 - $165 - SOLD
Fritz - Old Mill - PSA 4 - $155 - SOLD
Stark - Piedmont 350 PSA 4 - SOLD

Postage will be $10 (from England) including insurance - signature confirmation will be required on delivery.

Stark - Piedmont 350 PSA 4 - $150


I will take Stark please -
